dmca.title: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2006 3:01 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement
Notice]

Forwarding to Copyright for review.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement
Notice
Date:         Sat, 24 Jun 2006 19:25:51 -0700 (PDT)
From:         Ron Wainscott <ron@ronwainscottphotography.com>
To:         whois@swelldeal.com, abuse@theplanet.com,
copyright@theplanet.com,
legal@theplanet.com, webinfo@swelldeal.com



I am the photographer and copyright owner of all images contained on the
website http://www.dawnavril.com

Attached is a DMCA complaint in regards to the website
http://www.uselessjunk.net using my copyrighted images without
permission.

Ron Wainscott Photography does not tolerate copyright infringement and
will prosecute anyone involved in this illegal activity (including the
host of the site) to the fullest extent of the law.

It would be in your best interest to remove the link mentioned in the
attached complaint as well as any other images from DawnAvril.com
immediately.  Failure to do so will result in copyright infringement
charges being filed against anyone and everyone involved with the
operation of uselessjunk.net.  Your immediate attention to this matter
is required.

Ron Wainscott
(251) 967-4226


--
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
